about_the_game:
The first season of "Secrets of the Lost" follows eight people hired to find a map that unlocks the secret of eternal life.

A story based RPG, Secrets of the Lost will tell the tale from a different character's point of view over numerous episodes.

Key Information

  • Story based adventure: Follow the adventures of the company of nine as they embark on a dangerous quest; will they find external life or lose their own? 

  • Characters with unique skills: The skills of a miner, hunter, archer and even a pirate will be playable (depending on the episode).

  • Turn-based battles: Face off against bandits, guards and monsters that have come back to the world.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphic board that works with OpenGL 4.4 or higher
